maintenance.soil: Loose, fertile, and well-drained loam soil, pH value between 6-7
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy sunlight, resistant to half shade，avoid strong direct sunlight and long time sunlight
maintenance.watering: Shallow root, like moist, water thoroughly when soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely; very fresh when harvested in the morning
